Professional Summary
Results-oriented marketing and analytics professional with a strong foundation in data analysis, digital strategy, and performance reporting. Skilled in leveraging analytics tools and programming languages to uncover insights and support decision-making across cross-functional teams.


Technical Skills

Web Technologies: HTML, CSS/SCSS, JavaScript, Quarto, CMS Platforms, Analytics Tools

title: Marketing Analytics
text:
Below are selected projects that highlight my experience applying marketing analytics to real-world challenges. These projects reflect my ability to combine statistical tools, campaign data, and strategic thinking to inform decisions and drive results.
Whether developing dashboards, analyzing campaign performance, or uncovering insights through SEO and web analytics, each project is rooted in turning complex marketing data into clear, actionable strategies.

title: Marketing Analytics
text:
What You’ll Find

Campaign Performance Analysis: Evaluating the effectiveness of digital marketing efforts using data.
Data Visualization: Turning raw datasets into intuitive dashboards and reports.
Marketing Mix & Attribution: Exploring how different channels contribute to success.
Customer & Market Insights: Using analytics to better understand user behavior and optimize experiences.

title: Marketing Funnel Attribution Model
text:
Overview
This project developed a marketing attribution model to assign credit to touchpoints throughout the conversion journey. The insights supported channel optimization and budget reallocation.




Learning Outcomes

Track multi-touch customer journeys.

Model attribution using first-touch, last-touch, and linear approaches.

Visualize funnel performance.

Quantify channel impact on conversion.

Guide future campaign investment decisions.




Key Skills Gained

Attribution modeling

Funnel analysis

Data visualization

Campaign performance analysis

R or Python analytics pipelines

title: SEO Benchmarking Analysis
text:
Overview
This project compared SEO performance across competitors, highlighting keyword gaps, backlink profiles, and content effectiveness. Insights were used to guide an improved content and SEO strategy.




Learning Outcomes

Identify keyword opportunities through competitive research.

Track and compare domain authority and page rankings.

Recommend on-page SEO improvements.

Design a data-driven SEO content strategy.

Visualize competitor positioning.




Key Skills Gained

Keyword research

Web scraping & data cleaning

SEO analysis tools

Data storytelling

Strategy development

title: Hi, I’m Matthew Delgado
text: I’m a Marketing Management major passionate about digital strategy, analytics, and brand storytelling. I specialize in transforming data and ideas into clear, actionable insights that drive engagement and growth.

title: Hi, I’m Matthew Delgado
text:
About Me
I hold a Bachelor of Science in Marketing Management from Cal Poly Pomona (expected graduation: May 2025), and bring a focused skill set in digital strategy, advertising analytics, and performance optimization. I’ve worked with tools like Google Analytics, Meta Ads Manager, R, and Excel to analyze campaign data, refine audience targeting, and measure ROI. My approach blends creativity with data to deliver marketing solutions that are both effective and measurable.

title: Hi, I’m Matthew Delgado
text:
What I Do

Marketing Analytics & Insights
Turning campaign data into clear, actionable insights using tools like Google Analytics, Meta Ads Manager, and Excel.
Digital Strategy & Campaign Optimization
Designing and refining marketing strategies that drive engagement, conversions, and brand awareness across platforms.
Creative Content & Ad Development
Crafting audience-focused ad copy, visuals, and messaging that align with customer personas and business goals.
Data-Driven Reporting
Using Quarto and R to create professional, reproducible reports that communicate marketing performance and ROI clearly.

Welcome to my portfolio — a showcase of my work in marketing analytics, digital strategy, and more.

title: Digital Marketing
text: This page features a curated selection of projects that demonstrate my skills in campaign strategy, audience engagement, and brand positioning. Each project showcases how I combine creativity with performance metrics to drive measurable marketing outcomes.

title: Digital Marketing
text:
Meta Ads Campaign Optimization
I led the optimization of paid advertising campaigns using Meta Ads Manager. By testing targeting strategies, adjusting budget allocations, and refining ad creative, I improved both engagement rates and return on ad spend.
Skills Demonstrated:

Audience Segmentation: Refined targeting based on persona insights and behavior.

A/B Testing: Tested creative formats and placements to improve results.

Budget Strategy: Reallocated spend toward top-performing campaigns.

Performance Analysis: Interpreted campaign metrics to inform optimization.

title: Digital Marketing
text:
Social Media Strategy
I developed and executed a social media content strategy for a product-focused brand, aligning posts with key product lines and seasonal themes. I created original content for multiple platforms, tailored messaging to customer personas, and monitored campaign performance to guide content adjustments.
Skills Demonstrated:

Content Creation: Wrote platform-specific captions and designed creative assets.

Persona-Based Messaging: Crafted posts aligned with targeted audience profiles.

Engagement Tracking: Analyzed likes, CTR, and conversions across platforms.

Campaign Planning: Scheduled and optimized posts based on engagement patterns.

title: Digital Marketing
section: Product Promotion Campaign – Persona Activation Strategy
text:
Product Promotion Campaign – Persona Activation Strategy
I designed and launched a targeted Messenger ad campaign aimed at driving direct engagement with a high-intent customer persona. The campaign featured short-form copy tailored to mobile consumption and encouraged conversation-based conversion through Meta’s Messenger platform.
Skills Demonstrated:

Persona Activation: Segmented and targeted audiences based on behavioral intent and demographics.

Direct Response Strategy: Structured campaign around urgency and engagement-focused CTAs.

Ad Copywriting: Created concise, action-driven messages optimized for Messenger format.

Conversion Optimization: Monitored CTR and CPC to iteratively improve campaign performance.

title: Digital Marketing
text:
SEO & Brand Positioning Report
I conducted a comparative SEO analysis of two competitive brands, reviewing keyword strategy, metadata, and content hierarchy. The findings informed a revised brand positioning strategy and website optimization recommendations.
Skills Demonstrated:

SEO Benchmarking: Evaluated keyword usage and on-page structure.

Strategic Positioning: Recommended clearer, differentiated messaging.

Technical Audit: Reviewed site architecture, tags, and meta content.

Report Communication: Delivered insights in a clear, visual format.

title: Digital Marketing
text:
Client Consultation & Campaign Strategy
I audited a client’s existing marketing strategy and presented a refreshed campaign plan. The project involved identifying performance gaps, refining audience targeting, and recommending an updated creative direction and media mix.
Skills Demonstrated:

Marketing Audit: Assessed campaign strengths, inefficiencies, and missed opportunities.

Strategic Planning: Developed a campaign plan aligned with brand goals and audience intent.

Client Presentation: Delivered recommendations in a visual deck tailored to stakeholders.

Consulting Communication: Synthesized data and insights into actionable guidance.

title: Campaign Insights Dashboard
text:
Overview
This project involved building a dashboard to track and visualize marketing campaign performance. Metrics like click-through rate, conversion rate, and ROI were tracked across channels using R and Tableau.




Learning Outcomes

Visualize and monitor key marketing metrics.

Analyze performance trends across multiple campaigns.

Identify high- and low-performing segments.

Communicate insights through interactive visuals.

Develop data-informed recommendations.




Key Skills Gained

Dashboard development

Campaign analytics

Data wrangling in R

Tableau or R Shiny visualization

Performance measurement

title: Customer Segmentation Using Clustering
text:
Overview
In this analysis, customer data was segmented using clustering algorithms to identify meaningful groups. These segments informed targeting strategies and personalization efforts.




Learning Outcomes

Clean and prepare customer-level data.

Apply clustering techniques to group similar customers.

Interpret clusters to define marketing personas.

Recommend tailored messaging strategies.

Support targeted campaign development.




Key Skills Gained

K-means clustering

Data preprocessing

Customer profiling

Market segmentation strategy

R or Python for machine learning

title: Social Media Engagement Analysis
text:
Overview
This analysis examined engagement metrics across multiple social media platforms to identify content trends, audience preferences, and posting strategies that drive performance.




Learning Outcomes

Aggregate and clean social media data.

Identify high-performing content formats.

Understand audience behavior and peak times.

Support social strategy with data-backed recommendations.

Visualize results in an executive summary.




Key Skills Gained

Social analytics

Platform metric APIs

Content performance tracking

Audience insights

Strategic planning

title: Professional Summary
